Analyte(s): IgG autoantibodies to cyclic citrullinated peptide (CCP)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for TheraTest EL-anti-CCP/2TM ELISA test for detection of IgG autoantibodies to CCP in human serum as an aid in rheumatoid arthritis diagnosis
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use in clinical laboratories as an in vitro diagnostic test to detect and measure IgG autoantibodies to cyclic citrullinated peptide in human serum by ELISA, aiding in rheumatoid arthritis diagnosis in conjunction with other findings
